titleStmt.title: The doctrine of Christ's glorious kingdom, or, The New Jerusalem state now shortly approaching, is exceeding comfortable and very advantageous to all faithfull Christians, is manifest by the key and this whole work ...

titleStmt.author: Sherwin, William, 1607-1687?
